data.message: I wanted to  Thank You  Facebook Co- founder  Mr.  Mark for the movie you put together celebrating the  last 4 year's of my pro file  the music,  picture,s , and even my dad who passed away in  Feb of last year .WOW for you since February 4 ,2004  Five Hundred Million  people have joined ..And eight hundred and seventy-nine of them are your friends... could one of those 3 guys could be  YOU ? Old time's sake can be new time,s sake just kidding i watching FB ALS ice Bucket Challenge you were #3 Kati Perry ..And I'm so  happy for you really cause I have a 31 old son who I Love with all my Heart And a 17 teenager . And when your children are healthy it,s worth every cent i spend on them to have a better education .And the movie touch my Heart so much i can,t even express how to Thank you but i can't find it . but i watch it over so many times it stays in your Heart Forever  ..Thank you and may you be blessed with a happy Healthy family too!

replies.message: Hi RoseMary. Thank you for sharing your comment with us. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your Look Back video! -Natalie
But I found it and lost it again but mr. Simple Truth Block me
Did I do something wrong now I worry I'm sorry cause I didn't mean to hurt anybody cause when it hit more it gets dark and I can't find my video I thought it was so nice
Now I don't want to show my face

I'm sorry for being so rude I'm not like that I just not asking for anything just in a toxic neighbor and the news said don't believe every thing you read on face book and you have the rights to own it ..I have Channel 15 I was having a a very nice quite zone then I zone out mark ,,let you know for sure what  I really heard .

Why does everyone send me this picture back Mark. I was suppose to go to a painting on a twist class and paint some sunflowers , The reason why I think of the base ball player who had ALAS I bought his CD along time ago it in Black and white, Then I think of the Saints player who came down with it and my neighbor next door Mr.Perry he work at Nasa .im so tired of not getting enough sleep and noise power lines it's a same I can't go outside it makes me feel sick . We'll I going to go for you and when I make a promise I keep it even throw the trains are coming right now ,
Why when I do this it's gone ? In time ?

Oh sorry I just could not make it because she said choose what color back ground you want brown or blue I bought a wreath it said from Brownsville and that was in Aug 29 2014 wow you have a staff to do your work
